I'll try to take care of everything in this post If I miss anything let me
know.


Foxfingers slowly walked backwards hopeing to get a distraction so he could
run. As he neared another hallway the door slid shut behind him blocking his
way. He moved to his left toward another hall but again a door slid shut so
he couldn't go anywhere. "Actions like this make me think you don't trust
me." the drones trying to grab him clinched it. "Uh guys, you don't have to
show me out, I can find my own way." One drone grabbed him, then the next,
in a short time he was held aloft so he couldn't move. "I guess you want me
to hang around for a while."

Razor Claw looked to Ender knowing how bored the other bot had fealt.
Inaction to a Predacon was a fate worse than death. "If you want action then
stand behind me, when the door opens there will probably be a batallion of
Preds on the other side waiting to frag us, They'll be in for a surprise
when we escape without a scratch."

Outside the door Bullet stood poised with his weapon aimed toward the door
ready for it to open so he could finally slag something.

Lunarpine heard Shivah use the word Traitor to describe Megaton. "So the
scums no longer here after all." he thought. The wolfbot was now starting to
smile "Bring the prisoners outside and we'll have a nice little chat about
our mutual dislike for the monster." He knew that if they found a mutual
agreement that there was a chance everybody could get out of this without
any further damage.

Blaze and Silver Scout continued wandering through the halls until they
finally reached the exit. Blaze opened her wrist compartment and plugged a
few wires into the door. "You ready to go?" Blaze asked partially depressed
that it had come to this."Hopefully your friend outside will have enough
antidote for both of us." Silver Scout tilted her head appearing to be hurt
by Blazes comment She had thought she'd found a friend but instead Blaze was
only in it for the cure.Her trust of the tigress was spoiled. The wolf had
no choice though, she'd have to trust the other bot at least until they were
outside.
